about_the_game:
About the Game:

Step into the post-apocalyptic world of The Shopping Dead, where the last thing standing between you and survival is your shopping list. As a gig economy shopper, it’s your job to gather supplies while fending off hordes of zombies in two unique game modes, each offering a different flavor of intense 2D action.

 

In Aisle Adventures, your goal is simple: collect every item on your shopping list, solve environmental puzzles, and check out before time runs out—or before the zombies get you. With randomized shopping lists and different puzzles to tackle in each level, every trip to the store presents a fresh challenge. Beware of boss battles that will test your skills as you face powerful enemies standing in the way of your survival.

 

Prefer a more unpredictable experience? Try Checkout Blitz, a roguelike mode that tests your skills and endurance in a new way every run. With randomized power-ups, a variety of weapons, tougher enemies, and endless waves of undead, every run presents new dangers. Can you survive long enough to defeat bosses and make it to checkout—permanently?

 

Key Features:

  • Two Game Modes: Navigate complex levels in Aisle Adventures or face endless zombie hordes in the high-stakes roguelike mode, Checkout Blitz.

  • Randomized Shopping Lists: No two shopping trips are the same with dynamic item lists that change every level.

  • Intense Zombie Combat: Use a variety of weapons, from melee attacks to ranged options, to fend off waves of undead shoppers and terrifying bosses.

  • Puzzle-Solving Elements: Solve environmental puzzles in Aisle Adventures to unlock new areas, items, and secrets.

  • Upgrades & Power-ups: Earn cash by defeating zombies and completing objectives, then use it to upgrade your character’s attributes or buy powerful weapons and abilities.

  • Challenging Boss Battles: Face off against powerful zombies in epic boss fights that require strategy and quick reflexes.

  • Retro-Inspired Visuals: A 2D art style that blends nostalgia with a modern twist, complete with a fun, humorous vibe that doesn’t take itself too seriously.

About the Game:

Step into the post-apocalyptic world of The Shopping Dead, where the last thing standing between you and survival is your shopping list. As a gig economy shopper, it’s your job to gather supplies while fending off hordes of zombies in two unique game modes, each offering a different flavor of intense 2D action.

 

In Aisle Adventures, your goal is simple: collect every item on your shopping list, solve environmental puzzles, and check out before time runs out—or before the zombies get you. With randomized shopping lists and different puzzles to tackle in each level, every trip to the store presents a fresh challenge. Beware of boss battles that will test your skills as you face powerful enemies standing in the way of your survival.

 

Prefer a more unpredictable experience? Try Checkout Blitz, a roguelike mode that tests your skills and endurance in a new way every run. With randomized power-ups, a variety of weapons, tougher enemies, and endless waves of undead, every run presents new dangers.   • Challenging Boss Battles: Face off against powerful zombies in epic boss fights that require strategy and quick reflexes.

  • Retro-Inspired Visuals: A 2D art style that blends nostalgia with a modern twist, complete with a fun, humorous vibe that doesn’t take itself too seriously.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended

short_description: Survive the apocalypse one shopping trip at a time in The Shopping Dead! As a shopping courier, gather items, solve puzzles, and fend off zombies. Explore levels in Aisle Adventures or test your endurance in the rogue-like Checkout Blitz. Will you make it to checkout?
